sentences.cn: 他开玩笑地拨弄她的头发。

sentences.en: I leaned forward to rumple his hair, but he jerked out of the way.
sentences.cn: 我探身过去抚弄他的头发，但他马上躲开了。

sentences.en: Never fasten it in your collar or waistcoat, or rumple it in your hands.
sentences.cn: 千万别将餐巾别在领上或背心上, 也别在手中乱揉.

sentences.en: Rumple child produced mainly attributable to the paper around the edge of the deformation ( tight ).
sentences.cn: 产生这类褶子的主要原因是纸张四周变形 ( 紧边 ).

sentences.en: Rumple Minze is a peppermint schnapps imported from the Black Forest in Bavaria.
sentences.cn: 这是一种从巴伐利亚黑森林进口的薄荷甜酒.

sentences.en: There are Rumple of prints are generally not acceptable . 1.
sentences.cn: 有褶子的印品凡是都是不克不及剥夺的.

sentences.en: To crush together or press into wrinkles; rumple.
sentences.cn: 挤压挤在一起或压出皱纹; 弄皱.

sentences.en: You mustn't play in your new skirt, you'll rumple it.
sentences.cn: 你千万不要穿着新裙子去玩耍, 你会把它弄皱的.

trans.tran_cn: 弄皱, 弄得乱七八糟
trans.tran_en: to make hair, clothes etc less tidy
